titleStmt.title: Certayne reasons and arguments proving that it is not lawfull to heare or have any spirituall communion with the present ministerie of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Francis, 1562-1618.

publicationStmt.date: In the yeare of our Lord: 1608.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Errata on recto of P2, final leaf.
Identified as STC 10401 on UMI microfilm reel 1270, and as STC 14660a on UMI microfilm reels 558 and 802.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library, the Bodleian Library, and the Library of Congress.
Appears at reel 558 đ (Folger Shakespeare Library copy, identified as STC 14660a), reel 802 #5 (Bodleian Library copy, identified as STC 14660a), and at reel 1270, ⁸ (Library of Congress copy).
